name: Resting Earth
description: After Van Gogh, I always wondered what’s like to sit in satellite, watch the sun as it glazes the earth, waiting for each country ‘s turn to say good morning and which ones are about to say good night, observing the earth as it slowly turns. I wonder how solemn or frightening it would be. I was feeling melancholic when I painted this, It’s making me anxious about the uncertainty of the future and how many normal years we have left before we commit irreversible damage to Earth. It appears that as
